It defines a namedtuple _sunau_params with fields nchannels, sampwidth, framerate, nframes, comptype, compname. It defines constants for audio file magic number, various encoding types (MULAW_8, LINEAR_8, etc.), unknown size constant. It defines a list _simple_encodings containing some of those encoding constants. It defines a method getcompname(self) that returns a string based on self._comptype: 'ULAW' -> 'CCITT G.711 u-law', 'ALAW' -> 'CCITT G.711 A-law', else 'not compressed'.
